annotations.description: Learn how to make a Toronto cocktail, this newer cousin of the Old Fashioned. This classic cocktail is perfect for those who like Old Fashioned cocktails but...
annotations.title: The Drake Old Fashioned AKA the Toronto Cocktail

textContent:
2 oz Rye Whiskey
0.25 oz Fernet Branca
5 ml Simple syrup
2 Dashes Angostura bitters

Stir everything over ice in a mixing glass and strain in cocktail coupe. Express lemon zest and garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oxWv01H-LFc
title: The Toronto Old Fashioned
